Package PContour

Class PContour

java.lang.Object
PContour.PContour
public class PContour
extends java.lang.Object
Finding contours in binary images and approximating polylines. Implements the same algorithms as OpenCV's findContours and approxPolyDP.

Made possible with support from The Frank-Ratchye STUDIO For Creative Inquiry At Carnegie Mellon University. http://studioforcreativeinquiry.org/

Author:
Lingdong Huang

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  PContour.Contour
    Data structure for a contour, encodes vertices as well as hierarchical relationship to other contours
    class  PContour.Point
    Data structure for an integer-aligned coordinate on bitmap image

  • Method Details

    • findContours

      public java.util.ArrayList<PContour.Contour> findContours​(int[] F, int w, int h)
      Find contours in a binary image

      Implements Suzuki, S. and Abe, K. Topological Structural Analysis of Digitized Binary Images by Border Following.

      See source code for step-by-step correspondence to the paper's algorithm description.

      Parameters:
      F - The bitmap, stored in 1-dimensional row-major form. 0=background, 1=foreground, will be modified by the function to hold semantic information
      w - Width of the bitmap
      h - Height of the bitmap
      Returns:
      An array of contours found in the image.
      See Also:
      PContour.Contour

    • approxPolySimple

      public java.util.ArrayList<PContour.Point> approxPolySimple​(java.util.ArrayList<PContour.Point> polyline)
      Simplify contour by removing definately extraneous vertices, without modifying shape of the contour.
      Parameters:
      polyline - The vertices
      Returns:
      A simplified copy
      See Also:
      approxPolyDP(java.util.ArrayList<PContour.PContour.Point>,float)

    • approxPolyDP

      public java.util.ArrayList<PContour.Point> approxPolyDP​(java.util.ArrayList<PContour.Point> polyline, float epsilon)
      Simplify contour using Douglas Peucker algorithm.

      Implements David Douglas and Thomas Peucker, "Algorithms for the reduction of the number of points required to represent a digitized line or its caricature", The Canadian Cartographer 10(2), 112â€“122 (1973)

      Parameters:
      polyline - The vertices
      epsilon - Maximum allowed error
      Returns:
      A simplified copy
      See Also:
      approxPolySimple(java.util.ArrayList<PContour.PContour.Point>)
